remarks: Two ways to express that an operator is bounded.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nmoubi.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nmoubi.y $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
nmoubi.l $e |- L = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nmoubi.m $e |- M = ( normCV ` W ) $.
nmoubi.3 $e |- N = ( U normOpOLD W ) $.
nmoubi.u $e |- U e. NrmCVec $.
nmoubi.w $e |- W e. NrmCVec $.
nmobndi $p |- ( T : X --> Y -> ( ( N ` T ) e. RR <-> E. r e. RR A. y e. X ( ( L ` y ) <_ 1 -> ( M ` ( T ` y ) ) <_ r ) ) ) $.
$d L r y $.
$d M r y $.
$d N r y $.
$d T r y $.
$d U y $.
$d W y $.
$d X r y $.
